## Data

Data is collected combined from

IHME
- population by age/gender
- condition prevalences and mortalities

Benjafield et al
- OSA rates for different countries (30-69 years old population). We assumed here that same rates apply for the 15-74 years population.

Armeni et al.
- Condition Prevalences, OR and RR rates, annual costs
- OSA rates

EuroStat
- Money index correction for xxxx countries
